scripts.dev:all: rm src/index.js; cd src && ln -s all.js index.js && cd ..
scripts.dev:home: rm src/index.js; cd src && ln -s home.js index.js && cd ..
scripts.build:home: rm src/index.js; rm build/home.html; cp src/home.js src/index.js && react-scripts build && cp build/index.html build/home.html
